description: Semantic code search built for AI agents. Hybrid, AST-aware, context for 166 languages.

CODEWEAVER_CONFIG_FILE.description: Specify a custom config file path for CodeWeaver. Only needed if not using the default locations.

CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_API_KEY.description: Specify the API key for the embedding provider, if required. Note: {', '.join([p for p in _providers_for_kind('embedding') if p.])}

CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Specify the embedding model to use.

CODEWEAVER_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.description: Specify the embedding provider to use.

CODEWEAVER_HOST.description: Set the server host for CodeWeaver.

CODEWEAVER_LOG_LEVEL.description: Set the log level for CodeWeaver (e.g., DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR).

CODEWEAVER_MCP_PORT.description: Set the MCP server port for CodeWeaver if using http transport for mcp. Not required if using the default port (9328), or stdio transport.

CODEWEAVER_PORT.description: Set the port for the codeweaver management server (information and management endpoints).

CODEWEAVER_PROFILE.description: Use a premade provider settings profile for CodeWeaver.

CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_NAME.description: Set the project name for CodeWeaver.

CODEWEAVER_PROJECT_PATH.description: Set the project path for CodeWeaver.

CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_API_KEY.description: Specify the API key for the reranking provider, if required.

CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_MODEL.description: Specify the reranking model to use.

CODEWEAVER_RERANKING_PROVIDER.description: Specify the reranking provider to use.

CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Specify the sparse embedding model to use.

CODEWEAVER_SPARSE_EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.description: Specify the sparse embedding provider to use.

CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_API_KEY.description: Specify the API key for the vector store, if required.

CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PORT.description: Specify the port for the vector store.

CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_PROVIDER.description: Specify the vector store provider to use.

CODEWEAVER_VECTOR_STORE_URL.description: Specify the URL for the vector store.

CODEWEAVER__TELEMETRY__TOOLS_OVER_PRIVAC.description: Opt-in to potentially identifying collection of query and search result data. This is invaluable for helping us improve CodeWeaver's search capabilities. If privacy is a higher priority, do not enable this setting.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenAI-compatible services (not necessarily an API key *for* OpenAI). The OpenAI client also requires an API key, even if you don't actually need one for your provider (like local Ollama). So provide a dummy key if needed.

SSL_CERT_FILE.description: Path to the SSL certificate file for requests

AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.description: AWS Account ID for Bedrock service

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Access Key for Bedrock service

AZURE_COHERE_API_KEY.description: API key for Azure Cohere service (cohere models on Azure)

AZURE_COHERE_ENDPOINT.description: Endpoint for Azure Cohere service (cohere models on Azure)

AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)

AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT.description: Endpoint for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)

AZURE_OPENAI_REGION.description: Region for Azure OpenAI service (OpenAI models on Azure)

HF_HUB_VERBOSITY.description: Log level for Hugging Face Hub client

HF_TOKEN.description: API key/token for Hugging Face service

QDRANT__SERVICE__ENABLE_TLS.description: Enable TLS for Qdrant service, expects truthy or false value (e.g. 1 for on, 0 for off).

QDRANT__SERVICE__HOST.description: Hostname of the Qdrant service; do not use for URLs with schemes (e.g. 'http://')

QDRANT__SERVICE__HTTP_PORT.description: Port number for the Qdrant service

QDRANT__TLS__CERT.description: Path to the TLS certificate file for Qdrant service. Only needed if using a self-signed certificate. If you're using qdrant-cloud, you don't need this.
